problem_text_cn: 如图,四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,若四边形ABCD的外角∠DCE=70°,则∠BAD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the quadrilateral ABCD is inscribed in ⊙O. If the outer angle of the quadrilateral ABCD is ∠DCE = N_0, then the degree of ∠BAD is ()
raw_answer:
解:∵四边形ABCD内接于⊙O,∴∠BAD=∠DCE=70°,
故选:D．
raw_comment: 此题考查了圆内接四边形的性质,熟记圆内接四边形的外角等于它的内对角是解题的关键．
